name: The North Face Shellista II Waterproof Insulated Mid Boots - Women's
categories: Shellista II Waterproof Insulated Mid Boots
description: Stand out in a sea of black boots with this incredibly warm, waterproof offering from TNF. Bright hues, a chunky knit collar and an attractive brogue pattern combine with quality insulation and a serious outsole in a boot that ticks all the boxes for cold commutes and winter play.Nubuck upper repels snow and slush.Waterproof construction.200g PrimaLoft® insulation is warm and lightweight.Stylish, oversized knit cuff.Broguing detail on leather seams.Waterproof rubber shell is moulded for a women's-specific fit.Rubber outsole is optimized for grip in cold weather, with temperature-sensitive lugs.
